attributes.action: put an incentive in place for companies who return their business activities back to the UK from other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help the unemployement count in the UK, the PM should offer an incentive to those major companies that bring their business activities back to the UK. This inturn will help reduce the unemployement in the UK at this very difficult time. This will also help the economy grow.
